name: Galdir's Quest
description:
Made during Ludum Dare 47, Galdir's Quest is a 2D platforming game about the young dwarf Galdir and his quest to find the beer that was stolen from his hometown.

Credits:

  • Nehvis: Programming, Ideas, Assets
  • Mimir: Writing, Ideas, Assets
  • For any non self-made assets see credits.txt

Tools:

  • Godot
  • Aseprite
  • Tilesetter
  • Audacity

Controls:

  • A/D (Stick/Dpad): Walk
  • Space (Xbox A): Jump
  • K (Xbox X): Attack
  • Alt+Enter: Toggle Fullscreen
